settings.content:
Puracy was created to help improve the health & lives of all people and families while leaving a gentle footprint on our one & only planet.

For every sud we sell, we drive a portion back into our local community, sustainability initiatives, and charities that improve the lives, health, & opportunities of families nationwide.

settings.label: 1.4M+ hectares of forest protected
settings.title: 1.4M+ hectares of forest protected
settings.content: We have protected over 1.4 million hectares of forest thanks to our goal to help reforest some of the world's most at-risk biodiverse ecosystems.

settings.label: 600K plastic bottles saved
settings.title: 600K plastic bottles saved
settings.content: The number of plastic bottles we've prevented from entering the environment since 2013 thanks to our waste-saving, sustainable cleaning and packaging solutions.

settings.label: 4+ tons of carbon conserved
settings.title: 4+ tons of carbon conserved
settings.content: We proudly work with the Pachama Project to lessen the carbon footprint of every order, resulting in us offsetting over 4 tons of carbon per month through conservation and habitat restoration efforts.
We're confident you'll love our products, but if you're not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund. We may ask for feedback or a return to help improve our offerings.
